overview: Kathy Moore is a collector of rare expensive high-heels. The Dahto Black Diamond heels are priceless, and she'd do anything to get them! With her assistent Stella Stevens in tow all she has to do is spend three days at the house of Lady Sandy and the shoes are hers. But of course, she's not the only collector who wants the shoes... and what does Sandy have in mind for the next three days?
tagline: A pair of priceless heels... An obsessive collector... Three day of hardcore leg sex!
title: The Sole Collector
